CustomField.formula:
TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE( LastModifiedDate ))) & "." &
CASE( MONTH( DATEVALUE( LastModifiedDate )), 1, "01 (Jan", 2, "02 (Feb", 3, "03 (Mar", 4, "04 (Apr", 5, "05 (May", 6, "06 (Jun", 7, "07 (Jul", 8, "08 (Aug", 9, "09 (Sep", 10, "10 (Oct", 11, "11 (Nov", 12, "12 (Dec", "ERROR")
& ")"
CustomField.label: Month
